scriptures.text: Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
If you hold to my teaching, you are really my disciples. Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

warning.title: And a warning...
warning.text: There are six things the Lord hates, seven that are detestable to him: Haughty eyes, a lying tongue, hands that shed innocent blood, A heart that devises wicked schemes, feet that are quick to rush into evil, A false witness who pours out lies, And a person who stirs up conflict in the community.

slides.title: A possible pledge...
pledge_points: I will seek to be part of the solution.
I will actively seek out opportunities to engage in dialogue with those who have different views from mine.
I will seek to be a wise consumer.
I will not share information of uncertain validity.
I will bring a generous spirit to all my interpersonal interactions. Loving my neighbor will be my goal.
